entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm except 5 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
